title: To whom is a person giving Salam at end of the prayer, in congregation & when alone? Assim al hakeem
transcript: uh when a person gives salam in congregation or alone when i say assalamu alaikum warahmatullah assalam alaikum if i'm alone i'm giving salam to the angels to my right and to my left and to myself if i'm in congregation i'm giving salam to the muslims to my right and to my left his third
